name: 80 Blend Mode Swatches
description:
Inspired by an episode of Figma office hours, I played around with Figma's Blend Modes – something that I've never really understood, and made a set of 80 swatches to understand how these mathematical formulas work.


Methodology

I paired a top image layer with 5 different bottom layers (3 solid fills, 1 complex fill with opacity, and 1 image fill), and applied all the available Blend Modes in Figma to the top layer to see the effects on the final composition. For good measure, I also pulled some definitions from Wikipedia – check out the original article for the formulas!
